explains: adj. 可读的；易读的；读起来津津有味的
wordGroup: machine readable 计算机可读的；机粕读的

sentences.en: This is a well researched and very readable book.
sentences.cn: 这是一本研究深刻、可读性强的书。

sentences.en: The book is clear, readable, and adequately illustrated.
sentences.cn: 这本书易懂易读，而且图解充足。

sentences.en: His books on diplomatic history were eminently readable.
sentences.cn: 他的研究外交史的著作特别值得一读。
